attributes.action: devise a system to make prisoners financially independent whilst incarcerted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yes, the judicial / penal system has been used as a deterrent, but there are only losers when a criminal acto occurs. Why not consider an option to help prisoners help themselves ? Whilst on remand and in custody, accused are innocent till proven guilty (though you'd hardly beleive it). Public secotr companies target ex - offenders as a group to focus back to work schemes - why not keep them working all the time ? (rather than writing books) ...
